publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3379 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees a revision to the programme of business for Thursday 6 October 2005, as agreed on 28 September 2005— after, followed by Stage 1 Debate: St Andrew’s Day Bank Holiday (Scotland) Bill insert, followed by Motion on Natural Environment and Rural Communities Bill – UK Legislation followed by Motion on Civil Aviation Bill – UK Legislation Supported by: George Lyon*
